submitView.label: Submit
submitView.description: By selecting Submit, you are authorizing AvidXchange to process these payments.

table.emptyHeaderMain: Sorry, we didnt find a match.
table.emptyHeaderSub: Double-check your entry and try again.

stopPayment.title: Stop Payment Request
stopPayment.description: AvidXchange and the financial institution will attempt to stop the payment. Such attempt may not be successful. When you submit a stop payment request, you agree to be responsible for any charges, costs, fees or liability that may apply.

cancelPayment.title: Need to cancel this payment?
cancelPayment.cancelPaymentMessage: You have until 3PM EST to cancel. You may also need to reconcile this payment in your accounting system.

cancelPaymentConfirmation.title: Confirm cancellation
cancelPaymentConfirmation.cancelConfirmationMessage: We will not process payment TRE7183659. You cannot undo this action.

cancelPaymentAlert.cancelPaymentAlertMessage: Payment cancelled. You may also need to reconcile this payment in your accounting system.
